p: Biofilm activities against S. aureus ATCC 6538 and OVRSA were observed in concentrations of 0.5 mg mL −1 (OEPA) and 0.25 mg mL −1 (carvacrol) (Fig. 3). However, inhibition potential was detected in all tested concentrations of carvacrol and OEPA, in comparison to the negative control. Tetracycline inhibits biofilm formation ( S. aureus ATCC 6538 and OVRSA) in all concentrations tested (0.062, 0.125, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2 and 4 mg mL −1).
